name: Connecting Hearts (Beta)
description:
"Connecting Hearts" is a unique  2d endless runner game. "Pick the hearts which fit the color". In the game the player changes color on its own and so does collectables. The game is hard.

The game is PC only, and soon will release on android. So be sure to follow and support  "Little Cat Games".

The game is developed by "Little Cat Games" and music is used from "https://filmmusic.io/song/7016-newer-wave"

Little Cat Games - Discord, Twitter, Instagram
